resources.string: Accuracy of tag locations depends on GPS/Network availability. It may take up to few minutes to sync.
Please setup your Twitter user-name and password in preferences to post new reviews.

CREATE TABLE REVIEWS ( id integer primary key, heading String, description String, is_like integer, image_url String, latitude String, longitude String, review_date String, username String, location_name String); CREATE TABLE PENDING_REVIEWS ( id integer primary key, heading String, description String, is_like integer, image_url String, image_path String, latitude String, longitude String, review_date, username String, location_name String, creation_date Date, errors String, status String, retries integer);

Tribe is a platform for content aggregation, where content can be tagged using hashes. It leverages Twitter as a platform to share posted information and pictures; which gives the content visibility even outside Android on an existing social network. Some of the things that this app can allow you do are: 

1. Tag and lookup all the Blood Donors. Add contact or relevant information in text. Tribe #bloodDonors 

2. Tag and lookup all the Tourists attractions for the city. Tribe #tourists 

3. Tag and lookup all the cut down trees. Tribe #deforestation #lostTrees 

4. Tag and lookup all the ThoughtWorks conferences or events held. Tribe #thoughtworks #awayday 

5. Tag and lookup all the Social Impact programs around the city. Tribe #socialImpact 

6. Tag and lookup all bad experiences with local businesses. Beacon for others. Tribe #failBusiness #businessName 

Do not limit your imagination with the examples provided here. Generate unique content that people would love to follow. It's as simple as "Point-Shoot Tag-Tweet". Devise your own use of this app. Help "them", help yourself.
